v5_0_news_main_array_item_1_subtitle: The new search dropdown instantly displays results, speeding up and simplifying searches.
v5_0_news_features_update_items: 1. Smart numbers: improve numbers rounding and formatting.
v5_0_news_page_title: JustDo v5.0: Enhanced Search, New Theme & More
v5_0_news_page_description: Explore the latest features and improvements in JustDo v5.0, including a faster search dropdown, the Solid Orange theme, and smarter number formatting.
